column5: I found this site from comments on walleye central.  it looks really neat and appears to be well done. I would think if I were a camp owner/ operator, I would participate on it.  give it a look  www.realoutdoors.com/expocenter  i'm not trying to promote this site , just thought it would stir some comments and maybe help someone with their summer plans
Thought it was cool too.  Sent the link to my outfitter in case he would be interested.  If ya can't go to a real live show, its a great alternative.
